title: Provides for accumulation of merit time allowance; repealer
summary: Provides for granting of merit time allowance and release for prisoners with good behavior with certain limitations; provides commissioner of correctional services shall promulgate rules and regulations for merit time allowance to determine which inmates are good candidates for release.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, the executive law and the penal law, in relation to merit time allowance and release for prisoners accumulating merit time allowance and to repeal certain provisions of the correction law relating thereto
